sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词都可表示"商品，货物"之意。
means: goods ： 一般生活或商业用词，指销售或购入的商品。
merchandise ： 正式用词，指商业上销售或商家拥有货物的总称。
ware ： 指上市待卖的商品或货物。多用复数形式。
freight ： 指"货物"时，可与goods互换，此系美国英语。在英国，freight志指船装货物。
commodity ： 作"商品"解时系经济学名词，也可指日用品。

sentence.Network_en: On the customs declaration, the sender labeled the freight as agricultural machinery.
sentence.Network_cn: 在报关单上，寄货人将货物列为农用机械。

sentence.Network_en: The railways will carry a far higher proportion of freight traffic.
sentence.Network_cn: 铁路将承担比例高得多的货运量。

sentence.Network_en: Environmental pressures are strengthening the case for waterborne freight.
sentence.Network_cn: 环境的压力使人们更加认可水上运输。

list.abs: 货代最常用英语词汇大全 ... Ocean Freight 海运费 Sea Freight 海运费 Freight Rate 海运价.
一般有运费预付(Freight Prepaid)和运费到付(Freight Collect)。有的转运货物，一程运费预付，二程运费到付，要分别注明。
服装英语2 ... acetate lining 亚沙迪里布，亚沙地里布 air freight 空运费 allover embroidery 全身绣花，[粤]全身车花.
空舱费(Deadfreight) 空舱费相关案例 [3]  相关条目参考文献目录 　　装货港和卸货港都是由承租人提出而在合同内规定的。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'hire of a ship for transporting goods'): from Middle Dutch, Middle Low German vrecht, variant of vracht 'ship's cargo'. Compare with fraught

entry.def: Freight is the movement of goods by lorries, trains, ships, or aeroplanes.

example.ex: France derives 16% of revenue from air freight.
example.tran: 法国 16%的岁入来自航空货运。

entry.def: Freight is goods that are transported by lorries, trains, ships, or aeroplanes.

example.ex: 90% of managers wanted to see more freight carried by rail.
example.tran: 90%的经理希望看到更多的货物经由铁路来运输。

entry.def: When goods are freighted, they are transported in large quantities over a long distance.

example.ex: From these ports the grain is freighted down to Addis Ababa.
example.tran: 粮食从这些港口运到亚的斯亚贝巴。

means.word_mean: 1. goods carried by a large vehicle
2. transporting goods commercially at rates cheaper than express rates
3. the charge for transporting something by common carrier;

auth_sentence.content: He owned an air-freight business that occasionally shipped arms.
auth_sentence.res_content: He owned an air-freight business that occasionally shipped arms.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He owned an air-freight business that occasionally shipped arms.

auth_sentence.content: Neither will railroads, ships or motor freight.
auth_sentence.res_content: Neither will railroads, ships or motor freight.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Neither will railroads, ships or motor freight.

auth_sentence.content: Behind the turbines was a freight train loaded with containers.
auth_sentence.res_content: Behind the turbines was a freight train loaded with containers.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Behind the turbines was a freight train loaded with containers.

Sentence.sentence: The high cost of steam and the lesser need for speed kept the majority of the world's ocean freight moving by sail until the early years of the 20th century.

sentences.en: This aircraft company deals with freight only; it has no travel service.
sentences.cn: 这家航空公司只经营货运业务, 不经营客运业务。

sentences.en: We freighted the goods to the warehouse by truck.
sentences.cn: 我们用卡车把货物运到仓库。

jushi.english: This freight must be carefully handled when loading.
jushi.chinese: 这批货物装货时必须小心。

jushi.english: This aircraft company deals with freight only; it has no travel service.
jushi.chinese: 这家航空公司只经营货运业务,不经营客运业务。

jushi.english: We can send these boxes by air freight or by sea freight.
jushi.chinese: 我们可以空运或海运这些箱子。
